page.title: 19CHURCHES AND CHAPELS
page.content: ON THE TRIP ROUND OUR AREA WE COUNTED 9 CHURCHES AND 5 CHAPELS BUT THERE ARE MORE BECAUSE WE DIDN'T GO ALONG EVERY STREET. THE NEAREST CHURCH TO THE SCHOOL IS WORSBRO' DALE ST. THOMAS, AND AFTER WE HAD MADE ENQUIRIES ROUND SCHOOL WE WENT TO SEE THE VICAR TO RAISE SOME POINTS WITH HIM. IN SCHOOL, OUT OF 215 CHILDREN, ONLY 16 ATTENDED CHURCH OR CHAPEL REGULARLY; 74 COULD NOT REMEMBER EVER GOING TO A SERVICE OF ANYSORT; 84 COULD REMEMBER GOING TO A CHRISTENING OR A WEDDING. MANY THOUGHT CHURCHES AND CHAPELS WERE FOR CAROL SERVICES, SEEING JESUS ON THE CROSS, PRAYING TO GOD, CHRISTING SERVICES AND WEDDINGS, AND THAT VICARS, PRIESTS, NUNS, JESUS, ROBIN HOOD, CHRISTIANS AND WORSHIPPERS USED THEM AS WELL AS THOSE WHO WANTED TO TALK TO GOD TO THANK HIM OR GET RID OF THEIR SINS.
